title: Battleship
description: A classic board-game experience, challenge friends to thrilling LAN battles as you strategically deploy your fleet and hunt for victory.

title: Fipolio
description: A MERN stack web app for portfolio and financial management with REST API. Utilized CI/CD pipeline with Jenkins for automated Docker image builds, facilitating AWS deployment. Demonstrated full-stack skills and expertise in DevOps methodologies, ensuring seamless web application creation and deployment.

title: ToDo
description: A personal application for keeping track of to-do items with data persistency.

title: EDM PodCast
description: A web-based music streaming application that offers over 80 EDM songs
